#summary Release notes & version history

= Version 0.1 =

Initial release of the Zip.framework. This release enables you to read directly from files in a zip archive. No need to use NSTask anymore to execute command line tools.

{{{
# Checkout the sourcecode for the Xcode project for this release using:
svn checkout http://zip-framework.googlecode.com/svn/tags/version-0.1 zip-framework
}}}
